Detailed Description

Functions for SGMII initialization, configuration, and monitoring.

122069

Function Documentation

static int __cvmx_helper_need_g15618 ( void   )  [static]
int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_configure_loopback ( int  ipd_port,
int  enable_internal,
int  enable_external 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure a port for internal and/or external loopback. Internal loopback causes packets sent by the port to be received by Octeon. External loopback causes packets received from the wire to sent out again.

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to loopback.
enable_internal Non zero if you want internal loopback
enable_external Non zero if you want external loopback
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure.
int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_enable ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup and enable a SGMII interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD enabled but PKO disabled.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_enumerate ( int  xiface  ) 
static int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_hardware_init ( int  interface,
int  num_ports 
) [static]

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bring up the SGMII interface to be ready for packet I/O but leave I/O disabled using the GMX override. This function follows the bringup documented in 10.6.3 of the manual.

Parameters:
interface Interface to bringup
num_ports Number of ports on the interface
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
static int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_hardware_init_link ( int  interface,
int  index 
) [static]

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Initialize the SERTES link for the first time or after a loss of link.

Parameters:
interface Interface to init
index Index of prot on the interface
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure

Disable autonegotiation

1000Base-X mode

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure an SGMII link to the specified speed after the SERTES link is up.

index Index of prot on the interface

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Perform initialization required only once for an SGMII port.

Parameters:

index Index of prot on the interface
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
cvmx_helper_link_info_t __cvmx_helper_sgmii_link_get ( int  ipd_port  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Return the link state of an IPD/PKO port as returned by auto negotiation. The result of this function may not match Octeon's link config if auto negotiation has changed since the last call to cvmx_helper_link_set().

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to query
Returns:
Link state
int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_link_set ( int  ipd_port,
cvmx_helper_link_info_t  link_info 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure an IPD/PKO port for the specified link state. This function does not influence auto negotiation at the PHY level. The passed link state must always match the link state returned by cvmx_helper_link_get(). It is normally best to use cvmx_helper_link_autoconf() instead.

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to configure
link_info The new link state
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_probe ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Probe a SGMII interface and determine the number of ports connected to it. The SGMII interface should still be down after this call.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to probe
Returns:
Number of ports on the interface. Zero to disable.
